channel.title: gradle on Crushing C.O.D.E
channel.description: Recent content in gradle on Crushing C.O.D.E

item.title: Update Dependencies .Code .Repeat.
item.author: nisrulz@gmail.com (Nishant Srivastava)
item.description: Agree or not agree, but on an average consensus pretty much every android dev goes through the loop of Update Dependencies.Code.Repeat. for each of his/her android project.

item.title: The curious case of dependency conflicts
item.author: nisrulz@gmail.com (Nishant Srivastava)
item.description: If I were to ask a question to a room filled with android developers **“How many of you have been in that place of sheer helplessness and panic when your gradle build fails because of a version conflict in dependencies?
